com.sinch.verification

Interface VerificationListener


  • public interface VerificationListener
    An interface for listeners of the verification process.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onInitiated(InitiationResult initiationResult)
      Called when the verification initiation has been completed successfully.
      void onInitiationFailed(Exception exception)
      Called when the verification initiation has failed.
      void onVerificationFailed(Exception exception)
      Called when the verification has failed.
      void onVerified()
      Called when the verification has been completed successfully.

    • Method Detail

      • onInitiated

        void onInitiated(InitiationResult initiationResult)
        Called when the verification initiation has been completed successfully.
        Parameters:
        initiationResult - Verification parameters provided on initiation, for e.x. the selected sms language.

      • onInitiationFailed

        void onInitiationFailed(Exception exception)
        Called when the verification initiation has failed.
        Parameters:
        exception - An exception describing the error. May be one of InvalidInputException, ServiceErrorException or a native one like SocketException.

      • onVerified

        void onVerified()
        Called when the verification has been completed successfully.

      • onVerificationFailed

        void onVerificationFailed(Exception exception)
        Called when the verification has failed.
        Parameters:
        exception - An exception describing the error. May be one of InvalidInputException, CodeInterceptionException, IncorrectCodeException, ServiceErrorException or a native one like SocketException.
